[img]http://s19.postimg.org/okgi79i6r/1_trama.png[/img]. 

Valentino e Salvo, con sua moglie Donatella e la piccola figlia Adele, senza lavoro e sfrattati, con l'unica speranza di un contatto con l'onorevole La Duca per avere una raccomandazione, tornano al paese natale di Donatella e Valentino - Monteforte - per farsi aiutare economicamente dalla pensione della madre di lei.............

[img]http://s19.postimg.org/fzn6g380j/1_story.png[/img]

Valentino and Salvo, unemployed in search of fortune and recommendation, leave Palermo for a small country called Monteforte, where Valentino was born and have broke up the woman of his dreams. The situation in Monteforte is not promising: people whispered among square, church, bars and barber. The mature age of the villagers, inspire Salvo to live with the retirement of his mother in law, trying to involve every aunt and uncle that own a pension. Welcomed and forced to a strict diet, which keeps them healthy and alive.....
